highlights: Implemented new features on internal tools built using React and Ruby
Integrated monitoring and observability tools like Grafana and Victoria Metrics with existing backend services
POC on different libraries for distributed tracing
Built a tool for load shedding on Ambassador API Gateway during high concurrency live streaming events
Work extensively with Kubernetes for deploying and scaling hotstar infrastructure
Took on-call responsibility for DevOps team and helped resolve Live issues
Developed highly scalable microservices using Java and spring boot for various clients
Ran performance tests for backend services using Python and Locust and optimzed them to handle over 3000 req/sec
Used Event Driven architecture to communicate between multiple microservices
Built and shipped a workflow orchestration engine from scratch using Java and Spring Boot
Organised multiple Data Analysis workshops using Python and Pandas
Mentor new graduates and help them getting started in the organisation
Contributed towards delivery of each project (analysis, development and testing)
Interfaced with clients on a weekly basis, providing technological expertise

projects.description: SocialHub is a website where you can share all your social media links using one url. Create a profile and add references to all your social profiles. Built using React and Python.
projects.name: SocialHub

projects.description: Contributed to an Open Source project for an NGO to monitor the vitals of patients during COVID-19. This was deployed on an IoT device and it monitored all the essential vitals of patients in a COVID ward and informed the doctor in case of an emergency.
projects.name: Vital Monitoring
Cricket-Statsguru
projects.description: Cricket-Statsguru is a web application where you can see cricket statistics of a particular player both graphically and numerically. The app also allows users to compare the stats of any two players. Built using Angular and Python.

projects.name: Shopping Price Alert
projects.description: Shopping Price Alert is a web application where users can enter the URL of a product from Amazon/Flipkart and they will be notified as soon as there is a price drop in the selected product. Built using Angular and Python.
